constituent: relatives, half-uncle, above, small, little, parade
heisigStory: If you think of a parade of particularly disagreeable relatives, it should not be hard to imagine them as large bodies with little pea-brains above.
koohiiStory1: Your half-uncle is leading a parade of your relatives. (Note: 上 + 小 makes up part of "uncle" 叔, so I´ve called it "half-uncle".).
koohiiStory2: Your uncle organizes a parade of all your relatives, which he himself is only half in because he´s busy taking pictures of it.
kunYomi: いた.む、うれ.える、みうち
myStory: họ hàng. người phía trên và người nhỏ nhà rồng là họ hàng
